Harold Massey Tovell1

M, #56350, b. 1919, d. 2001

Mother*: Ruth Lillian Massey1 b. 6 Oct 1889, d. 1961

Birth*: 1919; Date 1919 per Memorial.1

Marriage*: before 1950; per Memorial.; Principal=Elizabeth Davidson1

Death*: 2001; Date 2001 per Memorial.1

Burial*: 2001; Massey Mauseleum, Mount Pleasant Cemetery, Toronto, York Co., Ontario; Memorial: (See Exhibit) TOVELL; Harold Massey; Tovell; 1919 - 2001; Elizabeth Davidson; Tovell; 1921 - 1995; Harold Murchison; Tovell; 1952 - 1973; Craig Massey; Tovell; 1955 - 1977 (Massey Mauseleum, Mount Pleasant Cemetery - plaque on stone beside mauseleum - May 26, 2007)1

Family: Elizabeth Davidson b. 1921, d. 1995

Harold Murchison Tovell1 b. 1952, d. 1973

Craig Massey Tovell1 b. 1955, d. 1977

Ida H. Massey1,2,3

F, #56360, b. 6 November 1847

Father*: Daniel Massey2 b. 24 Feb 1798, d. 15 Nov 1856

Mother*: Lucena Bradley2 b. 21 Mar 1803, d. 3 Mar 1872

Birth*: 6 November 1847; Clarke Twp., Newcastle, Durham Co., Ontario; Date 1849 & location Cda. per 1901 Census. Date Nov 6 1847 & location Newcastle per GEDCOM of Dennis B. von Ting, June 28, 2007. Date 1846 & location Ont. per 1871 Census. Date 1847 & location UC per 1861 Census. Date 1850 & location Newcastle per marriage reg'n.2,4,5,3

Marriage*: 16 August 1871; Clarke Co., Newcastle, Durham Co., Ontario; Marriage Reg'n.: Groom: John Tamblyn; Age: 24; Res.: Toronto; Born: Newcastle; Status: bachelor; Occ.: Bank Clerk; Parents: Thomas & Sarah Tamblyn; Bride: Ida H. Massey; Age: 21; Res. & Born: Newcastle; Status: spinster; Parents: Daniel & L. Massey; Wit.: Emma Powell, Cobourg & H. H. Tamblyn, Newcastle; Date: Aug 16 1871; Place: Newcastle; Rel.: CE; Performed by: Rev. H. Brant? (Ontario Marriage Registration, ancestry.com)

Date Aug 6 1870 & location Newcastle per GEDCOM of Dennis B. von Ting, June 28, 2007.

Note: Elida is shown to be single and with her brother Hart A. Massey in Newcastle in the 1871 Census. Marriage 1871??; Principal=John Tamblyn5,4,3

Marriage*: before 1878; England; Date b. 1878 per 1881 Census. Location England per GEDCOM of Dennis B. von Ting, June 28, 2007.; Principal=William Watts5

Census*: April 1861; Newcastle, Durham Co., Ontario; Age 14 at 1861 Census: see Luciena Massey (mother)2

Census: April 1871; Newcastle, Durham Co., Ontario; Age 25 at 1871 Census: see Hart A. Massey (brother)4

Married Name: 16 August 1871; Tamblyn5

Note*: 13 July 1875; Clarke Twp., Newcastle, Durham Co., Ontario; Ida H. Massey's first husband, John Tamblyn, died Jul 13 1875 - per GEDCOM of Dennis B. von Ting, June 28, 2007.5

Married Name: before 1878; Watts5

Census: after 1881; Prospect Terrace, Settle, York, England; Age 33 at 1881 Census: see William Watts

Census: 1901; Giggleswick, York, England; Age 52 at 1901 Census: see William Watts
